data.title: California Department of Justice Releases New Medicinal Cannabis Guidelines
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – Today, the California Department of Justice released the “Guidelines for the Security and Non-Diversion of Cannabis Grown for Medicinal Use” to clarify the state’s laws governing medicinal cannabis, specifically those related to the enforcement, transportation, and use of medicinal cannabis.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
